wikipedia_page.main:
Peter John Edward Trew (born 30 April 1932) has been a British Conservative Party politician, civil engineer and company director.
At the 1970 general election, he was elected on his second attempt as Member of Parliament (MP) for Dartford, defeating Labour incumbent Sydney Irving by 560 votes. However, Irving regained the seat at the February 1974 general election.
